attributes.action: force the supermarket chains to fix/lock the back wheel of all their trolleys
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What is the point in have four free and independantly moving wheels on airport and supermarket trolleys? It is mindboggling watching people walking out of Sainsburys and Tesco sideways, fighting to keep the trolley going in a straight line. 

I watched a TV programme a few years back where they had spent thousands of pounds researching how to make the trolleys easier to handle. Just lock the back wheels like every other industrialised nation on earth.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
